title: 14 Suspension
body:
So i got banned for 14 days because i was being toxic and i will probably get permaban. 
Can i get money back or just sell my account before i get perma?

replies.body: How about option three: making sure you don't get a permaban?
Hi, i know that i could try that, but sometimes when i have feeder on my team or when someone afk then i just blame them.
Cool, and how to do that? :D

> [{quoted}](name=SavageConcordia,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Vky14Gu4,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-07-13T14:32:15.945+0000)
>
> Self control?

I haven't flamed for a long time and if i did, it wasn't anything big. This time there was a guy that was basicly afk and just said everything to the enemy team, like "NUNU ON BARON AND NOONE IS CLOSE TO HIM" {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} The enemy jungler just always took my stuff because my teammate told him wich camps are alive and we lost that game just because of that one {{champion:141}} AND I WOULD FFFFCC...... maybe ur right....

You can't, aside from removing the return key. You can minimize the chat box "Menu->interface" as well as hitting /mute all at the beginning of games. Note that muting other players does not mean they can't see what you type.
You can try to sell it, but it's illegal.
well, i got a 14 days ban too for toxicity last season. my advice is to use /mute all every game, and avoid any fights in champion select. it worked for me avoiding the perma :)
